author: cwiklik
msg: UIMA-1986 Changed how a critical region is synchronized in StackDumpTimer. Removed synchronization on a Long and replaced it with synchronization on an Object instance.

author: fhanik
msg: No need to instantiate a new driver instance each time, simply reuse the one we got

author: dennisl
msg: [MCHANGES-215] Make it possible to add the columns created, id and updated to a JIRA Report
